prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Roger Lea MacBride Interview, 1982, Accession # 10187-m, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library on October 18, 1982, by Roger Lea MacBride of Charlottesville, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this interview conducted by Andrea Miller Rich for "Project Liberty," Roger L. MacBride discusses the 1976 election in which he ran as the presidential candidate of the Libertarian Party.
